body.p: Unless otherwise stated, any references in this Basis for Conclusions to:

li.p: IAS 27 are to IAS 27 Consolidated and Separate Financial Statements.
IAS 28 are to IAS 28 Investments in Associates.
IAS 31 are to IAS 31 Interests in Joint Ventures.
